meanings.definition: A group or set of four.
meanings.sent1: The family of ducks waddled together in a tetrad.
meanings.sent2: She collected a tetrad of colorful seashells on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The tetrad of cupcakes disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: The four friends formed a tetrad of support for each other.
meanings.sent5: The tetrad of trees stood tall in the forest, creating a harmonious group.

meanings.sent1: The tetrad of pencils rolled off the desk.
meanings.sent2: He arranged a tetrad of books on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The tetrad of kittens played together in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The four-leaf clover was a lucky tetrad for her.
meanings.sent5: The tetrad of flowers brightened up the room with their colors.

meanings.sent1: She completed her degree in a tetrad of hard work.
meanings.sent2: The athlete trained for a tetrad to prepare for the competition.
meanings.sent3: The tetrad of high school passed by quickly for him.
meanings.sent4: The tetrad of seasons brought changes in nature.
meanings.sent5: The tetrad of Olympic Games showcased the world's best athletes.

meanings.definition: A group of four related entities.
meanings.sent1: The tetrad of planets aligned perfectly in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The company consisted of a tetrad of sibling founders.
meanings.sent3: The tetrad of colors in the painting complemented each other.
meanings.sent4: The tetrad of elements formed a stable compound.
meanings.sent5: The tetrad of musicians played in perfect harmony during the concert.
